name: Saturnine
description: Saturnine - a horror survival adventure. In Saturnine you will explore abandoned villages and the woods of Nearna. But beware: Nightfall comes closer and something mystifying and evil is awaiting you in the shadows of the darkness!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: Intel(R) Core(TM) i5-4590 CPU @ 3.30 Ghz Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 760 DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 500 MB available space
